reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress fits nicely and appreciate its thickness, with one noting it looks very slimming. Customers disagree on the dress's appearance, with some finding it pretty while others say it looks cheap.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute dress
items.body: It's a simple, yet, pretty dress. I'm 5'2, 103 lbs and purchased a XS, the dress fits like a glove. Originally I was going to wear it the way it is, but the day of the event, I folded it up to slightly above my knees. And it was still very pretty. Material is nice and thick, not flimsy and thin at all. Pair it with classic pointy pumps and you can't go wrong. Read more
items.author: Michelle T. P.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pleased and flattered
items.body: I am beyond pleased about this purchase. The cut of the dress is flattering for the size that I am. The material quality and thickness exceeded my expectations. The size was true to fit. I can’t express how excited I am to wear the dress! Read more
items.author: Longtime buyer

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Flattering Fit but not great Quality
items.body: I am 5’10 weigh 164 Looks very slimming on me, not sure if I am going to keep it or not due to the fabric. It’s thin, looks cheap . Read more
items.author: Jody

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Professional and feminine!
items.body: Love it! This is perfect for a work conference. It’s very tight and fitted in all the right places. I’m usually a size 0 or 00 and the XS was perfect. Usually everything is too big on me. Read more
items.author: Heather

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect fit & material is soft
items.body: Love the fit - true to size. Fabric is lightweight & very comfortable to wear. Read more
items.author: Heather BTrue

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars If you want a dress that's slimming this is it!
items.body: Love this dress. It's very slimming. And true to size. Read more
items.author: A must have top. Love the comfort!!

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Chinese size
items.body: This is a chinese size dress. I buy a lot from amazon and my size is M. This one is lije x small. Returning it. Read more
items.author: C. SANCHEZ

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Black and white dress.
items.author: Nina Rusiana

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

The design is easy to style with simple accessories and works well in photos thanks to clean lines and a balanced silhouette.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Bodycon Long Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Dark Blue and White, Black and White Colorblock, Black and White. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.

If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.
